mdRecord.dcterms:title: Graham Cemetery, Little River Dist.
mdRecord.dcterms:description:
Located 500 yards into a field exactly opposite 740 Starbuck Rd. SE and adjacent to 767 Starbuck Rd. SE and 931 Starbuck Rd.SE. The land is on property owned by Charles & Shelby Hall. There is a farm road leading up to the cemetery. The cemetery is visible using Google Earth &Google Maps.
N 36 55.038' W 80 14.327'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
